Property.name: trackGap

Property.descr: By default all timeline bands scroll independently. The parameter specifies the band index that the current band scroll in synchrony.
Property.name: syncWith

Property.name: layoutWith

Property.descr: Parameter to display the band whether highlighted or not.
Property.name: highlight
